item.title: An Exploratory Introduction to the Plotly Package
item.author: blog@albert-rapp.de (Albert Rapp)
item.description: Currently, I am quite curious about interactive plots which is why I am reading Scott Murray’s highly recommendable book on D3. For those of you who don’t know it, D3.js is a JavaScript library that is great for creating amazing interactive Data-Driven-Documents on the web. Unfortunately, compared to ggplot2, D3’s learning curve feels quite steep and I am not yet able to work with it yet. Fortunately, there are other interactive graphing libraries out there that I can use to get a first feel for creating interactive plots.
item.dc:creator: Albert Rapp
